mapper.select: SELECT question_id AS questionId, content, option_a AS optionA, option_b AS optionB, option_c AS optionC, option_d AS optionD, correct_option AS correctOption, difficulty_id AS difficultyId, topic_id AS topicId, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt, source FROM questions ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT question_id AS questionId, content, option_a AS optionA, option_b AS optionB, option_c AS optionC, option_d AS optionD, correct_option AS correctOption, difficulty_id AS difficultyId, topic_id AS topicId, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt,source FROM questions WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO questions(content, option_a, option_b, option_c, option_d, correct_option, difficulty_id, topic_id, created_by, created_at, source) VALUES (#{content}, #{optionA}, #{optionB}, #{optionC}, #{optionD}, #{correctOption}, #{difficultyId}, #{topicId}, #{createdBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{source})
mapper.update: UPDATE questions SET content = #{content}, option_a = #{optionA}, option_b = #{optionB}, option_c = #{optionC}, option_d = #{optionD}, correct_option = #{correctOption}, difficulty_id = #{difficultyId}, topic_id = #{topicId}, created_by = #{createdBy}, created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.select: SELECT q.question_id AS questionId, q.content, q.option_a AS optionA, q.option_b AS optionB, q.option_c AS optionC, q.option_d AS optionD, q.correct_option AS correctOption, q.difficulty_id AS difficultyId, q.topic_id AS topicId, t.topic_name AS topicName, q.source FROM test_questions tq JOIN questions q ON tq.question_id = q.question_id JOIN topics t ON q.topic_id = t.topic_id WHERE tq.test_id = #{testId} ORDER BY tq.order_no
SELECT correct_option FROM questions WHERE question_id = #{questionId}

SELECT question_id AS questionId, topic_id AS topicId, content, option_a AS optionA, option_b AS optionB, option_c AS optionC, option_d AS optionD, correct_option AS correctOption, difficulty_id AS difficultyId, created_by AS createdBy, source FROM questions WHERE topic_id = #{topicId} ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT #{count}

SELECT question_id AS questionId, content, option_a AS optionA, option_b AS optionB, option_c AS optionC, option_d AS optionD, correct_option AS correctOption, difficulty_id AS difficultyId, topic_id AS topicId FROM questions WHERE difficulty_id = #{difficultyId} AND question_id NOT IN ( SELECT question_id FROM test_questions WHERE student_username = #{studentUsername} AND test_id = #{testId} ) ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 1

SELECT q.question_id AS questionId, q.content, q.option_a AS optionA, q.option_b AS optionB, q.option_c AS optionC, q.option_d AS optionD, q.correct_option AS correctOption, q.topic_id AS topicId, t.topic_name AS topicName, q.source FROM questions q JOIN topics t ON q.topic_id = t.topic_id WHERE q.topic_id = #{topicId} ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT q.question_id AS questionId, q.content, q.option_a AS optionA, q.option_b AS optionB, q.option_c AS optionC, q.option_d AS optionD, q.correct_option AS correctOption, q.difficulty_id AS difficultyId, q.topic_id AS topicId, t.topic_name AS topicName, q.source FROM test_questions tq JOIN questions q ON tq.question_id = q.question_id JOIN topics t ON q.topic_id = t.topic_id WHERE tq.test_id = #{testId} AND tq.student_username = #{studentUsername} ORDER BY tq.order_no

SELECT difficulty_id FROM questions WHERE question_id = #{questionId}

SELECT q.question_id AS questionId, q.content, q.option_a AS optionA, q.option_b AS optionB, q.option_c AS optionC, q.option_d AS optionD, q.correct_option AS correctOption, q.difficulty_id AS difficultyId, q.topic_id AS topicId, q.created_by AS createdBy, q.created_at AS createdAt, t.topic_name AS topicName FROM questions q JOIN topics t ON q.topic_id = t.topic_id JOIN courses c ON t.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.course_name = #{courseName} AND t.topic_name = #{topicName}
SELECT question_id FROM questions WHERE content = #{content}

SELECT q.question_id AS questionId, q.content, q.option_a AS optionA, q.option_b AS optionB, q.option_c AS optionC, q.option_d AS optionD, q.correct_option AS correctOption, sa.selected_option AS selectedOption FROM test_questions tq JOIN questions q ON tq.question_id = q.question_id LEFT JOIN student_answers sa ON sa.test_id = #{testId} AND sa.student_username = #{studentUsername} AND sa.question_id = q.question_id WHERE tq.test_id = #{testId} ORDER BY tq.order_no
